headline: Watts Water Technologies Elects Suzanne L. Stefany to Its Board of Directors
summary: NORTH ANDOVER, Mass., November 10, 2025--Watts Water Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: WTS) today announced the election of Suzanne L. Stefany as a member of the Board of Directors. Ms. Stefany was also appointed by the Board to serve as a member of the Governance and Sustainability Committee and Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors.

headline: Internet of Things Q3 Earnings: AMETEK (NYSE:AME) is the Best in the Biz
summary: Wrapping up Q3 earnings, we look at the numbers and key takeaways for the internet of things stocks, including AMETEK (NYSE:AME) and its peers.
